fixes.name: Date (End Date)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR endDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN IF(
    useCustomDate,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude],
    endDateParam
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF that references parameters into DAX. Parameter references were replaced with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]). The IF(...) THEN ELSE END was mapped to IF(condition, value_if_true, value_if_false). The calculated field [Max Date Exclude] was converted to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] to use table[column] notation.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date]), and all parameter-based calculations must be created as measures.
